summary: Two closely related episodes. Youths make problems for two local orchestras about to compete nationally, and in a talent competition a young girl gets stage fright, while another lies to her boss to compete.
cast: Jirí Suchý|Jirí Slitr|Marketa Krotka|Ladislav Jakim|Karel Mares|Vladimír Hrabánek|Jaroslava Razova|Petr Brozek|Sylva Danícková|Dagmar Dvorácková|Pavlína Filipovská|Majka Gillarova|Hana Hegerová|Susan Kodicek|Vera Kresadlová|Zdena Lorencová|Jana Malknechtová|Bohumír Palecek|Jirí Planner|Antonín Pokorný|Frantisek Pokorný|Eva Pospísilová|Yvonne Prenosilová|Lilka Rocáková|Pavel Sedlacek|Bohunka Sladká|Eva Stránská|Milan Sulc|Renata Tumová|Dana Urbankova|Dana Urbánková|Zorka Zahálková
keywords: twist the dance|traditional czech music|song|rock 'n' roll|band
title: Concurso
